verses.verse: Truly, <WG281> truly, <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, He that enters <WG1535> not by the door <WG2374> into <WG1519> the sheepfold, <WG833> <WG4263> but climbs <WG305> up some other <WG237> way, the same <WG1565> is a thief <WG2812> and a robber. <WG3027>
But he that enters <WG1535> in by the door <WG2374> is the shepherd <WG4166> of the sheep. <WG4263>
To him the porter <WG2377> opens; <WG455> and the sheep <WG4263> hear <WG191> his voice: <WG5456> and he calls <WG2564> his own <WG2398> sheep <WG4263> by name, <WG3686> and leads <WG1806> them out.

And when <WG3752> he puts <WG1544> forth <WG1544> his own <WG2398> sheep, <WG4263> he goes <WG4198> before <WG1715> them, and the sheep <WG4263> follow <WG190> him: for they know <WG1492> his voice. <WG5456>
And a stranger <WG245> will they not follow, <WG190> but will flee <WG5343> from him: for they know <WG1492> not the voice <WG5456> of strangers. <WG245>
This parable <WG3942> spoke <WG2036> Jesus <WG2424> to them: but they understood <WG1097> not what <WG5101> things they were which <WG3739> he spoke <WG2980> to them.
Then <WG3767> said <WG2036> Jesus <WG2424> to them again, <WG3825> Truly, <WG281> truly, <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, I am <WG1510> the door <WG2374> of the sheep. <WG4263>
All <WG3956> that ever <WG3745> came <WG2064> before <WG4253> me are thieves <WG2812> and robbers: <WG3027> but the sheep <WG4263> did not hear <WG191> them.
I am <WG1510> the door: <WG2374> by me if <WG1437> any <WG5100> man enter <WG1525> in, he shall be saved, <WG4982> and shall go <WG1525> in and out, and find <WG2147> pasture. <WG3542>

The thief <WG2812> comes not, but for to steal, <WG2813> and to kill, <WG2380> and to destroy: <WG622> I am come <WG2064> that they might have <WG2192> life, <WG2222> and that they might have <WG2192> it more abundantly. <WG4053>
I am <WG1510> the good <WG2570> shepherd: <WG4166> the good <WG2570> shepherd <WG4166> gives <WG5087> his life <WG5590> for the sheep. <WG4263>

But he that is an hireling, <WG3411> and not the shepherd, <WG4166> whose <WG3739> own <WG2398> the sheep <WG4263> are not, sees <WG2334> the wolf <WG3074> coming, <WG2064> and leaves <WG863> the sheep, <WG4263> and flees: <WG5343> and the wolf <WG3074> catches <WG726> them, and scatters <WG4650> the sheep. <WG4263>
The hireling <WG3411> flees, <WG5343> because <WG3754> he is an hireling, <WG3411> and cares <WG3199> not for the sheep. <WG4263>
I am <WG1510> the good <WG2570> shepherd, <WG4166> and know <WG1097> my sheep, and am known <WG1097> of mine. <WG1699>
As the Father <WG3962> knows <WG1097> me, even <WG2504> so know <WG1097> I the Father: <WG3962> and I lay <WG5087> down my life <WG5590> for the sheep. <WG4263>

And other <WG243> sheep <WG4263> I have, <WG2192> which <WG3739> are not of this <WG5026> fold: <WG833> them also <WG2548> I must <WG1163> bring, <WG71> and they shall hear <WG191> my voice; <WG5456> and there shall be one <WG3391> fold, <WG4167> and one <WG1520> shepherd. <WG4166>
Therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> does my Father <WG3962> love <WG25> me, because <WG3754> I lay <WG5087> down my life, <WG5590> that I might take <WG2983> it again. <WG3825>

No <WG3762> man <WG3762> takes <WG142> it from me, but I lay <WG5087> it down of myself. <WG1683> I have <WG2192> power <WG1849> to lay <WG5087> it down, and I have <WG2192> power <WG1849> to take <WG2983> it again. <WG3825> This <WG5026> commandment <WG1785> have <WG2192> I received <WG2983> of my Father. <WG3962>
There was a division <WG4978> therefore <WG3767> again <WG3825> among <WG1722> the Jews <WG2453> for these <WG5128> sayings. <WG3056>
And many <WG4183> of them said, <WG3004> He has <WG2192> a devil, <WG1140> and is mad; <WG3105> why <WG5101> hear <WG191> you him?
Others <WG243> said, <WG3004> These <WG5023> are not the words <WG4487> of him that has a devil. <WG1139> Can <WG1410> a devil <WG1140> open <WG455> the eyes <WG3788> of the blind? <WG5185>
And it was at <WG1722> Jerusalem <WG2414> the feast <WG1456> of the dedication, <WG1456> and it was winter. <WG5494>
And Jesus <WG2424> walked <WG4043> in the temple <WG2411> in Solomon's <WG4672> porch. <WG4745>

Then <WG3767> came <WG2944> the Jews <WG2453> round <WG2944> about <WG2944> him, and said <WG3004> to him, How <WG2193> long <WG2193> do you make <WG142> us to doubt? <WG142> If <WG1487> you be the Christ, <WG5547> tell <WG2036> us plainly. <WG3954>

Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> them, I told <WG2036> you, and you believed <WG4100> not: the works <WG2041> that I do <WG4160> in my Father's <WG3962> name, <WG3686> they bear <WG3140> witness <WG3140> of me.
But you believe <WG4100> not, because <WG1063> you are not of my sheep, <WG4263> as I said <WG2036> to you.
My sheep <WG4263> hear <WG191> my voice, <WG5456> and I know <WG1097> them, and they follow <WG190> me:

And I give <WG1325> to them eternal <WG166> life; <WG2222> and they shall never <WG3364> <WG1519> <WG3588> <WG165> perish, <WG622> neither <WG2532> <WG3756> shall any <WG5100> man pluck <WG726> them out of my hand. <WG5495>

My Father, <WG3962> which <WG3739> gave <WG1325> them me, is greater <WG3187> than all; <WG3956> and no <WG3762> man <WG3762> is able <WG1410> to pluck <WG726> them out of my Father's <WG3962> hand. <WG5495>
I and my Father <WG3962> are one. <WG1520>
Then <WG3767> the Jews <WG2453> took <WG941> up stones <WG3037> again <WG3825> to stone <WG3034> him.

Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> them, Many <WG4183> good <WG2570> works <WG2041> have I showed <WG1166> you from my Father; <WG3962> for which <WG4169> of those <WG846> works <WG2041> do you stone <WG3034> me?

The Jews <WG2453> answered <WG611> him, saying, <WG3004> For a good <WG2570> work <WG2041> we stone <WG3034> you not; but for blasphemy; <WG988> and because <WG3754> that you, being <WG5607> a man, <WG444> make <WG4160> yourself <WG4572> God. <WG2316>
Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> them, Is it not written <WG1125> in your <WG5216> law, <WG3551> I said, <WG2036> You are gods? <WG2316>
If <WG1487> he called <WG2036> them gods, <WG2316> to whom <WG3739> the word <WG3056> of God <WG2316> came, <WG1096> and the scripture <WG1124> cannot <WG3756> <WG1410> be broken; <WG3089>

Say <WG3004> you of him, whom <WG3739> the Father <WG3962> has sanctified, <WG37> and sent <WG649> into <WG1519> the world, <WG2889> You blaspheme; <WG987> because <WG3754> I said, <WG2036> I am the Son <WG5207> of God? <WG2316>
If <WG1487> I do <WG4160> not the works <WG2041> of my Father, <WG3962> believe <WG4100> me not.

But if <WG1487> I do, <WG4160> though <WG2579> you believe <WG4100> not me, believe <WG4100> the works: <WG2041> that you may know, <WG1097> and believe, <WG4100> that the Father <WG3962> is in me, and I in him.
Therefore <WG3767> they sought <WG2212> again <WG3825> to take <WG4084> him: but he escaped <WG1831> out of their hand, <WG5495>

And went <WG565> away <WG565> again <WG3825> beyond <WG4008> Jordan <WG2446> into <WG1519> the place <WG5117> where <WG3699> John <WG2491> at first <WG4412> baptized; <WG907> and there <WG1563> he stayed. <WG3306>

And many <WG4183> resorted <WG2064> to him, and said, <WG3004> John <WG2491> did <WG4160> no <WG3762> miracle: <WG4592> but all <WG3956> things that John <WG2491> spoke <WG2036> of this <WG5127> man were true. <WG227>
And many <WG4183> believed <WG4100> on <WG1519> him there. <WG1563>
